channel.title: CVE Feed for nikeo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nikeo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-36755|2024-08-04T17:37:07.169Z -- nikeo -- customizr
item.description: The Customizr theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 4.3.0. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the czr_fn_post_fields_save() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to post fields via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2020-36753|2024-08-04T17:37:06.732Z -- nikeo -- hueman
item.description: The Hueman theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 3.6.3. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the save_meta_box() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to save metabox data via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
